
# Other resources



## Great bookdown textbooks

This book is prepared using `bookdown` R package and 
many 
open source codes and examples provided in other  `bookdown`-built textbooks.
Below are listed those of particular value to this book.

From Hadley:

- https://r4ds.had.co.nz/
- https://adv-r.hadley.nz/
- https://r-pkgs.org/

- https://geocompr.robinlovelace.net/
